LanguageData.GEU_SignalExpansionTower.label: Gestalt Signal Relay
LanguageData.GEU_SignalExpansionTower.description:
A specialized facility designed to extend the signal range of the Gestalt network. When connected to a Gestalt Hub, it significantly increases the control radius.

As the number of connections increases, the control range grows exponentially, eventually enabling global network synchronization.

Note: Due to strong magnetic interference, relays must be placed with a minimum gap of one cell between them.
